info.ephyra.trec
Class TRECPattern

java.lang.Object
  info.ephyra.trec.TRECPattern

public class TRECPattern
extends java.lang.Object

A TRECPattern is a simple data structure consisting of the ID of the pattern and regular expressions that describe correct answers.

Version:
2006-07-07
Author:
Nico Schlaefer

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String id
          The ID of the pattern.
private  java.lang.String[] regexs
          The regular expressions that describe correct answers.

          Creates a TRECPattern data structure and sets the ID and the regular expressions.

          Returns the ID of the pattern.
